00054 #ifndef AMP_amp_stdint_H
00055 #define AMP_amp_stdint_H
00056 
00057 
00058 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00059 #   include <stddef.h> /* MSVC defines intptr_t, uintptr_t in stddef.h */
00060 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00061 #   include <stdint.h> /* C99 header with intptr_t, uintptr_t */
00062 #elif defined(__llvm__) && defined(__clang__)
00063 #   include <stdint.h> /* C99 header with intptr_t, uintptr_t */
00064 #else
00065 #   error Unsupported platform.
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 
00069 #endif /* AMP_amp_stdint_H */
